scripts.full-setup: pnpm install && sequelize-cli db:create && sequelize-cli db:migrate && sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.full-restore: pnpm run db:drop && pnpm run db:create && pnpm run db:restore
scripts.full-restore:linux: pnpm run db:drop && pnpm run db:create && pg_restore -U postgres -h localhost -p 5432 -d yamaha_dashboard_machine -v ./backup/dashboard_machine_backup.dump
scripts.full-restore:prod: sequelize-cli db:drop && sequelize-cli db:create && cmd /c ""C:\Program Files\PostgreSQL\17\bin\pg_restore.exe" -U postgres -h localhost -p 5432 -d yamaha_dashboard_machine -v D:\dashboard-machine\server\backup\dashboard_machine_backup.dump"
scripts.full-restore:new: pnpm run db:drop && pnpm run db:create && pnpm run db:restore:new
